@rb30 @TinaHolmboe @LeonieWatson Oh, but I’m describing a tool used to make web sites. Not sites themselves. - 90s I made them by hand with emacs. - 00s I used asp, php or java to power them. - 10s I used ruby or python to power them. Now I like to pre-build them with an SSG so they’re ready-to-serve as files.
